creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: openwork 3-D "pendant" with pairs of dragons and lions and a fish; double chain with round and floral links attached to top; two top clips with butterfly motifs; long chains with wheel pendants and three bells alternate short chains with floral pendants and bugle beads below large pendant
dimension: 10 3/4 x 9 3/16 x 1 1/2 in. (27.31 x 23.34 x 3.81 cm) (excluding top clips and chain)
title: Collar
